column5: I can't believe how much ice has formed in one day bring on the fish
where do you find these types of photos?
Thanks for the update Terry.  here you go danbob http://coastwatch.glerl.noaa.gov/modis/mod...on=o&page=1
right here photos
thanks
Hey Terry when do you plan on hitting the ice on simco?
I have been out a couple of times on south part cooks bay  but now I am waiting till I can get out for whitefish on the big part of the lake, hoping in a week or 2 but you never know
We could take the boat bud....
Sure is a different view from the last time you posted a report
yeah for sure I would think it is just a skim coat of ice and a feather would be too much weight for it but it's a good start

It sure looks promissing.... Out here with the mild temps and the rain it did help to thicken the ice....  we have a good 12" of ice and are in the deep freeze again, -17C going down to -22C overnight
Don't know if this is going to work but here is McLaurin Bay from the google satellite view  McLaurin Bay
that looks good, it worked

How was the ice were ya went looking today Wayne?  Nice yakk,n at ya today. I was a little worried that maybe a cop would come by, and think we were do,n a trade off.LOL   BTW That GM doesnt suit ya bud.  Safe drive out east.

Ice in Penetang/Midland Harbours..... I wouldn't be on it.. or lack there of thanks to ships and wind.  As for doin a trade off... that happens on the corner...in my laneway a few times a week. Cops don't seem to care...  The GMC is a step better than walkin to Ottawa Brian  ...and Terry and I have found a place to go on Friday, where the ice has been well tested.
Lucky you Terry i'm still waiting to find a good lake to hit. But at the same time looking to go out on the ice with other just in case. Better safe then sorry i say.
Wayne, yer not saying yer going for the little fish are ya?LOL
Nope.... Lakers!
Me , whitefish I need the practice for the feb trip come to think of it I need practice for lakers too
I may just see you guys on Friday!
hope to see you there
sketchy
I bet its nearly covered today.........I know a spot!.....
Thanks for the update Terry... still hoping to get out on Firday for some Perchies... I asume that ice was made last night and one can stroll out with caution? thanks, HH
That would be GOOD Ron !
